other_tests.findings: Identified a deleterious germline DICER1 mutation c.3505dupT (p.[Ser1169Phefs*8]) in exon 21.
Pathological review revealed invasive follicular variant papillary thyroid carcinoma.
Presence of an inherited, deleterious germline DICER1 mutation (c.3579_3580delCA). Acquired somatic mutation c.5438A3G (p.[Glu1813Gly]) identified in thyroid carcinoma.
Inherited deleterious germline mutation c.2379T 3G identified. Acquired somatic mutation c.5113G 3A (p.[Glu1705Lys]) detected in thyroid carcinoma.
